name: Nimbus
description: A Unity-based mobile game offering relaxing, therapeutic exploration and encounters full of surprises.. 10,000+ downloads.

name: Lantern Model Rendering
description: A research project creating detailed 3D lanterns using OpenSCAD, Blender, and Three.js. Published at DAI 2023.

name: Customizable and Interactive Music Box
description: A parametric 3D-printable music box system that transforms MIDI files into customizable spinner models. Features contactless actuation and modular design for educational applications.

name: Food Express
description: A scalable online food ordering platform built with Spring Boot and React, deployed with AWS.
